mapper.insert: insert into products(products_num, kind, name, price, info, image, seller, inputdate, state, readcount) values(prd_seq.nextval, #{kind}, #{name}, #{price}, #{info}, #{image}, #{seller}, sysdate, 0, 0)
mapper.select:
select products_num, kind, name, info, price, image, seller, inputdate, state, readcount, (select count(*) from products_comments where idx = products_num) as comments from products
where name like #{keyword}
where kind = 'a'
where kind = 'b'
where kind = 'c'
where seller = #{keyword}
order by inputdate desc
order by readcount desc
order by comments desc

select count(*) from products
where name like #{keyword}

select A.products_num, A.kind, A.name, A.info, A.price, A.image, A.seller, A.inputdate, A.state, A.readcount, B.state as paystate, B.buyer from products A inner join pay B on A.products_num = B.prd_num where A.kind = 'a' and A.state = 1 and A.seller=#{loginId}
